Text:
these are bad sizes!!! the other one I did not download to spread to all my friends BECAUSE it was 1.19gb and poor quality and a waste of the rest of the dvd's free space. this one won't fit on a 4.7gb. 
Please go to mrbass.org and download DVDSHRINK and shrink it down to 4.7gb . Thank you, it'll save us time....so little time..... They are attacking gaza as I type this!
